data.oai_dc:dc: Excel file showing bulk delta13C and delta15N isotope values from macroinvertebrates collected in freshwater steams in the region of Zagreb, Croatia in April to May of 2016. Other columns include taxonomic and functional information about each sample that was analysed for isotopes, site name, stream name, and the land use classification for each sampling station.
Bottom-up control|Diet estimates|Energy Flow|Stable isotope analysis|Trophic redundancy|Urban streams
